item.title: Making a Multiplayer FPS: Basic Movement
item.description: In this post, I've successfully implemented basic player movement. Players can move, jump, and look around. Jittering is the next problem to be solved.

item.title: Making a Multiplayer FPS: Interpolation
item.description: In this post we will see the implementation of interpolation as well as starting the weapon system.

item.title: Making a Multiplayer FPS: Introduction
item.description: In this blog series, I'll be taking you through the process of creating my own online first-person shooter (FPS) game.
